sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO NOTIFICATION(NOTIFICATION_FROM_USER_CODE, NOTIFICATION_TO_USER_CODE, NOTIFICATION_MESSAGE, NOTIFICATION_URL, REG_ID, REG_DATE, REG_IP, UPD_ID, UPD_DATE, UPD_IP) VALUES(#fromUserCode#, #toUserCode#, #message#, #url#, #id#, sysdate(), #ip#, #id#, sysdate(), #ip#)
sqlMap.select: select NOTIFICATION_MESSAGE as notificationMessage, NOTIFICATION_URL as notificationUrl, NOTIFICATION_READ_YN notificationReadYn, b.USER_PIC_PATH as userPicPath, b.USER_PIC_SAVE_NAME as userPicSaveName from NOTIFICATION a, USER b where a.NOTIFICATION_FROM_USER_CODE = b.USER_CODE AND NOTIFICATION_TO_USER_CODE = #myUserCode#
sqlMap.update: update notification set notification_read_yn = 'Y', upd_id = #updId#, UPD_IP = #updIp#, UPD_DATE = now() where notification_from_user_code = #userId#
